item.title: Vanity, Thy Number is Toll Free
item.description:
Vanity definitely has a place in business. Any technology that provides a competitive advantage, including a vanity toll-free number, is worth considering. What distinguishes a vanity number from a regular toll-free number is the connection between letters and numbers on a standard telephone keypad. While the “1” button lacks letters, numbers “2” through “9” each have three letters assigned to them. This letter-number association allows phone numbers to be dialed as words...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/vanity-thy-number-is-toll-free/

They have a reason for calling, usually translating to a motivated customer...

item.title: Low Cost 800 Numbers For You
item.description:

This incredibly affordable price allows you to reserve an 800 number exclusively for your business. Maintaining the service costs a mere $5 per month for as long as you need the number. If you decide to cancel, you’re only responsible for your final bill...
